input.description:
String [Required]
The name of the Service to be invoked. The name should match the one defined in the module configuration while declaring the service mappings.

String [Optional]
The mode to specify whether the specified service is be invoked synchronously or asynchronously. The valid values are : sync, async
The default is 'sync'

input.value: Invalid Service. Generating the Error Response.
Reading the grid details from the module configuration.
Service mapping not found for the specified service. Generating the Error Response.
Could not convert paramters to params xml. Generating the Error Response.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <xsl:element name="soap:Header"> <wsse:Security xmlns:wsse="http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd"> <xsl:attribute name="soap:mustUnderstand"> <xsl:text>1</xsl:text> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:element name="wsse:UsernameToken"> <xsl:element name="wsse:Username">${user name}</xsl:element> <xsl:element name="wsse:Password"> <xsl:attribute name="Type"> <xsl:text>http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-username-token-profile-1.0#PasswordText</xsl:text> </xsl:attribute> ${password} </xsl:element> </xsl:element> </wsse:Security> </xsl:element> <xsl:element name="soap:Body"> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'${mode}' = 'async'"> <soa:executeProcessAsync xmlns:soa="http://bmc.com/ao/xsd/2008/09/soa"> <xsl:element name="soa:gridName">${grid name}</xsl:element> <xsl:element name="soa:processName">${service}</xsl:element> <xsl:element name="soa:parameters"> <xsl:element name="soa:Input"> <xsl:for-each select="//parameter"> <xsl:element name="soa:Parameter"> <xsl:element name="soa:Name"> <xsl:value-of select="name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(value/*) = 'true'"> <xsl:element name="soa:Value"> <xsl:attribute name="soa:type"> <xsl:text>xs:anyType</xsl:text> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:element name="soa:XmlDoc"> <xsl:copy-of select="value/*" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:element> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:element name="soa:Value"> <xsl:attribute name="soa:type"> <xsl:text>xs:string</xsl:text> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:element name="soa:Text"> <xsl:value-of select="value" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:element> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:element> </xsl:element> </soa:executeProcessAsync> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <soa:executeProcess xmlns:soa="http://bmc.com/ao/xsd/2008/09/soa"> <xsl:element name="soa:gridName">${grid name}</xsl:element> <xsl:element name="soa:processName">${service}</xsl:element> <xsl:element name="soa:parameters"> <xsl:element name="soa:Input"> <xsl:for-each select="//parameter"> <xsl:element name="soa:Parameter"> <xsl:element name="soa:Name"> <xsl:value-of select="name" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="boolean(value/*) = 'true'"> <xsl:element name="soa:Value"> <xsl:attribute name="soa:type"> <xsl:text>xs:anyType</xsl:text> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:element name="soa:XmlDoc"> <xsl:copy-of select="value/*" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:element> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:element name="soa:Value"> <xsl:attribute name="soa:type"> <xsl:text>xs:string</xsl:text> </xsl:attribute> <xsl:element name="soa:Text"> <xsl:value-of select="value" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:element> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </xsl:for-each> </xsl:element> </xsl:element> </soa:executeProcess> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:element> </soap:Envelope> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

input.value: Error in executing the SOAP adapter. Generating the Error Response.
Error in striping namespaces. Generating Error Response.
Extracting Async Response from the SOAP envelope.
Extracting Sync Response from the SOAP envelope.
Successfully Invoked the service. Generating success response.

documentation.description:
Invoke a service. Inputs are service name - One of the service names as defined in the module configuration. parameters - A STRING containing XML as in the format: <parameters />
OR
<parameters> <parameter> <name>invocation mechanism</name> <value>command-line</value> </parameter> </parameters> mode: sync or async.
